description: This header file declares internal APIs for the CCSP Namespace Component, including functions for namespace registration, retrieval, building, and support checks within the CCSP framework. It primarily provides prototypes for internal functions used in namespace management.

methods.name: CcspNsCompUnregisterNamespace
methods.description: Unregisters a specified namespace in the component.

methods.name: CcspNsCompGetNamespaceCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of namespaces registered.

methods.name: CcspNsCompGetNamespaceStringArray
methods.description: Retrieves the list of namespace strings as an array.

methods.name: CcspNsCompGetNamespaceStructArray
methods.description: Retrieves the list of namespace structures.

methods.name: CcspNsCompBuildFromNamespaceStringArray
methods.description: Builds internal namespace structures from an array of namespace strings.

methods.name: CcspNsCompBuildFromNamespaceStructArray
methods.description: Builds internal namespace structures from an array of namespace structures.

methods.name: CcspNsCompIsObjectSupported
methods.description: Checks if a namespace object is supported, optionally at the next level.

methods.name: CcspNsCompCleanAll
methods.description: Cleans up and resets the namespace component.

methods.name: CcspNsCompDumpObject
methods.description: Outputs internal state or structure of the namespace object for debugging.
